articles.title: US Briefly Names Alibaba, Baidu as Firms Aiding China’s Military - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Pentagon added Alibaba Group Holding Ltd., BYD Co., Baidu Inc. and TP-Link Technologies Co. to a list of companies that aid the Chinese military – before withdrawing it minutes later without explanation.
